```{r}
library("htmltools")
library("bsplus")
```

```{r}
bs_modal(id = "modal", title = "I'm a modal", body = "Yes, I am.")
```

```{r}
tags$button(type = "button", class = "btn btn-default", "Click for modal") %>%
  bs_attach_modal(id_modal = "modal")
```
